DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present Phase 1 study ass cardiac safety Staccato Loxapine administer healthy volunteer 3 period crossover study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects good general health agree use medically acceptable effective birth control method throughout study . Subjects take prescription nonprescription medication within 5 day treatment , Subjects acute illness within last 5 day treatment , Subjects smoker , OR Subjects ECG abnormality baseline .
